https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uwWlNXpTl7Pb3zlopuH09sz8iju.jpg An American girl's beautiful song in a lonely New York karaoke bar catches the attention of an ultra-hip Japanese boy. Convinced she is his dream come true, he attempts to win her over despite his lack of English. Dream Machine
